metadata.title: CVE-2019-5772 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Sharing of objects over calls into JavaScript runtime in PDFium in GoogleChrome prior to 72.0.3626.81 allowed a remote attacker to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
